summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the acquisition by condemnation of land and other property necessary for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Stone Avenue from North 92nd Street to North 96th Street; providing for the necessary slopes for cuts or fills upon the property abutting in the reasonable original grading of said street; and providing that the entire cost of said improvement shall be paid from the City Street Fund, or such other fund as the City Council may direct.
